prompt: <description>**Instructions for part 1:** Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal and the height is half the length of the sides. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.5, 0.2518, 0.0] Next, create a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. The sketch should have a single face with the following loop: - line_1: Start Point=[0.0, 0.0], End Point=[0.25, 0.0] - line_2: Start Point=[0.25, 0.0], End Point=[0.25, 0.125] - line_3: Start Point=[0.25, 0.125], End Point=[0.0, 0.125] - line_4: Start Point=[0.0, 0.125], End Point=[0.0, 0.0] Scale the 2D sketch by 0.25. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z axis by 0.125 units. **Instructions for part 2:** Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The prism is slightly tilted to the right. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Next, create a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. The sketch should have a single face with the following loop: - line_1: Start Point=[0.0, 0.0018], End Point=[0.125, 0.0] - line_2: Start Point=[0.125, 0.0], End Point=[0.125, 0.2484] - line_3: Start Point=[0.125, 0.2484], End Point=[0.75, 0.2518] - line_4: Start Point=[0.75, 0.2518], End Point=[0.5, 0.2518] - line_5: Start Point=[0.5, 0.2518], End Point=[0.5, 0.3768] - line_6: Start Point=[0.5, 0.3768], End Point=[0.0, 0.3768] - line_7: Start Point=[0.0, 0.3768], End Point=[0.0, 0.0018] Scale the 2D sketch by 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z axis by 0.25 units. The final shape consists of the assembled parts with a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side. The prism is centered on a white background. The dimensions of the parts are provided in the JSON.</description>
